developer_token.title: Developer Token
developer_token.description: Developer token granted by Google to use their APIs. More instruction on how to find this value in our docs

client_id.title: Client Id
client_id.description: Google client id. More instruction on how to find this value in our docs

client_secret.title: Client Secret
client_secret.description: Google client secret. More instruction on how to find this value in our docs

refresh_token.title: Refresh Token
refresh_token.description: Refresh token generated using developer_token, oauth_client_id, and oauth_client_secret. More instruction on how to find this value in our docs

customer_id.title: Customer Id
customer_id.description: Customer id must be specified as a 10-digit number without dashes. More instruction on how to find this value in our docs

login_customer_id.title: Login Customer ID
login_customer_id.description: If your access to the customer account is through a manager account, this field is required and must be set to the customer ID of the manager account (10-digit number without dashes). More information about this field you can see here

start_date.title: Start Date
start_date.description: UTC date and time in the format 2017-01-25. Any data before this date will not be replicated.

conversion_window_days.title: Conversion Window
conversion_window_days.description: Define the historical replication lookback window in days

query.title: User defined query to build a report by wish

primary_key.title: The unique field to be used as primary key in destination database (if provided)

cursor_field.title: If not provided, the FULL-REFRESH model will be used. If provided, this will be an incremental stream with this cursor field. Please use datetime fields (start_date, end_date) for proper work.

table_name.title: The table name in your destination database for choosen query.

custom_query.query: SELECT campaign.accessible_bidding_strategy, segments.ad_destination_type, campaign.start_date, campaign.end_date FROM campaign
SELECT segments.ad_destination_type, segments.ad_network_type, segments.day_of_week, customer.auto_tagging_enabled, customer.id, metrics.conversions, campaign.start_date FROM campaign
